author: Laura Burdon-Manley
title: Ukrainian gymnastics overshadowed by war
description: The team continues to train in Doha, Qatar as Russia’s invasion of Ukraine shows no signs of slowing down.
content: Doha, Qatar Qatars gymnastics training centre is alive with activity as the Ukrainian gymnastics team and other world-class athletes double flip over the vault and perform intricate turns on the hori… [+5219 chars]
